dmca.title: [EV1-C2442965P] Copyright infringement - IMMEDIATE RESPOSE REQUIRED
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----

> This message is in MIME format. Since your mail reader does not

this format, some or all of this message may not be legible. 
 
 (multipart/alternative)
MIME element (text/plain) 
> Dear Mr. Huhtiniemi,
>  
> Evgenia Eremina (Ashanti) and I have tolerated all the plagiarism that 
> has gone on, on your site.  Entire articles and photos have been 
> lifted from our site, such as the one posted by Gemini37 on (your 
> site) http://peachyforum.com/forums/1/134798/ShowThread.aspx
>  
> This stolen from our site at http://www.evgeniaermina.com/html/bio.htm
>  
> Phenix has posted copyrighted photos from Met-Art.com on 
> http://peachyforum.com/forums/6/134798/ShowThread.aspx  as well as 
> links to sites that plagiarize her photos.
>  
> Even this link http://hosted.teensgoporn.com/hard/017/?ref=511252  
> from your page http://peachyforum.com/forums/1/350427/ShowThread.aspx 
> was published without her consent and you will find no Title 18 
> Section 2257 compliance notice that she was 18 years old at the time 
> the photos were shot, because none exist.  In fact we are going into 
> litigation again Paul Lisinski, owner of TeensGoPorn.com over these same photos
and other linked to your site.
>  
> Yet when I posted something yesterday, asking her fans to support her 
> by going to eBay and buying her signed photos, you banned my for a 
> century and a half, till December 13, 2156, 6:39 AM and there was 
> added some ridiculous comment about my somehow selling her photos without her
knowledge.
>  
> Then there is the statement that: 
>  
> Her real name iz [sic] Evgenia Eremina, also known as Ashanti. Russian 
> whore that lives in St. Petersbug [sic]. I contacted her, for $250 
> she'll do everything for you but she doesn't travel.
> http://peachyforum.com/forums/2/134798/ShowThread.aspx
>  
> You need to remove all the plagiarized and defamatory content; that 
> means every photo we or the photographers or the websites who own them 
> do not give you permission to use.
>  
> Your record keeping compliance statement maintains: 
>  
> All visual depictions displayed on this website (domain), whether of 
> actual sexually explicit conduct, simulated sexual content or 
> otherwise, are visual depictions of persons who were at least 18 years 
> of age when those visual depictions were created. All other visual 
> depictions displayed on this website are exempt from 18 U.S.C. 
> 2257(a)-(c) because said visual depictions are not visual depictions 
> of conduct specifically listed in 18 U.S.C Section 2256 (2) (A)-(D), 
> but are merely depictions of non-sexually explicit nudity, or are 
> depictions of simulated sexual conduct, or are otherwise exempt 
> because the visual depictions were created prior to July 3, 1995, or 
> were produced, manufactured, published, duplicated, reproduced, or 
> reissued before July 3, 1995. The owners and operators of this website 
> are secondary producers and not primary producer, as defined in 18 U.S.C. Section
2257 Sec. 75.1 (C)(1)-(2), non-US citizens and located outside US.
>  
> That your site is non-sexual is about as far from the truth as you can get. 
> Your site represents hardcore pornography in its strictest definition, 
> down to your logo of an anthropomorphized peach with its tongue 
> hanging out and the quote from the movie Face Off of ³I could eat a 
> peach for hours...²
>  
> The US Department of Justice can seek to imprison fine both you and 
> those ThePlanet.com
>  
> The law states;
>  
> Whoever violates this section shall be imprisoned for not more than 5 
> years, and fined in accordance with the provisions of this title, or 
> both. Whoever violates this section after having been convicted of a 
> violation punishable under this section shall be imprisoned for any 
> period of years not more than 10 years but not less than 2 years, and 
> fined in accordance with the provisions of this title, or both.
>  
> Using the photos is a copyright infringement, as prohibited by the U.S. 
> Copyright Act, 17 U.S.C. 101 et seq., (see
> http://lcweb.loc.gov/copyright/title17/) and International copyright 
> law and is in direct violation of the international rights of the copyright owner.
> If the content is not taken down we will seek damages to the statutory 
> maximum of $150,000 per image. 17 U.S.C. § 504(c)(2) and you have a 
> lot of images, especially considering those you facilitate through your links.
>  
> Additionally, I am certain this is a common practice on all of your 
> forums and on your main site, which generates money for you through 
> thousands of affiliate links.
>  
>  
 
 
Evgenia Eremina
Images of Perfection 
                    
 
 
http://www.evgeniaeremina.com
http://www.zhenia.com
